description: Tender eggplant and creamy peanut sauce are the perfect match in this easy veggie curry.
name: Eggplant Satay Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a tablespoon of oil in a large pan on medium heat and cook the eggplant for 1012 minutes to soften. Remove from the pan and set aside. Heat the rest of the oil and cook the onion on medium heat for 4-5 minutes, add the garlic and coriander stalks and curry paste and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes.
Add the peanut butter, coconut milk and half a can of water and simmer for 5 minutes. Stir in eggplant slices and cook for 5 minutes then add the broccoli and cook for 45 minutes until tender.
Squeeze over lime juice to taste and serve with chopped coriander on top.
